quote: Some dreams, some poems, some musical phrases, some pictures, wake feelings such as one never had before, new in colour and formâ€”spiritual sensations, as it were, hitherto unproved
quote_letters: SOME DREAMS SOME POEMS SOME MUSICAL PHRASES SOME PICTURES WAKE FEELINGS SUCH AS ONE NEVER HAD BEFORE NEW IN COLOUR AND FORM-SPIRITUAL SENSATIONS AS IT WERE HITHERTO UNPROVED
